properties.name: aws.secretsmanager.enabled
properties.description: Is AWS Secrets Manager support enabled.

properties.name: aws.secretsmanager.fail-fast
properties.description: Throw exceptions during config lookup if true, otherwise, log warnings.

properties.name: aws.secretsmanager.name
properties.description: Alternative to spring.application.name to use in looking up values in AWS Secrets Manager.

properties.name: aws.secretsmanager.prefix
properties.description:
Prefix indicating first level for every property.
 Value must start with a forward slash followed by a valid path segment or be empty.
 Defaults to "/config".
